item.title: gloo
item.description: × GLOO HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ GLOO MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Tank Lane: ROAM Tier : A+ Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : 0 gloo × @ Close More Info Hero skills Gloo Skills 1 × Slam, Slam Gloo reaches out and slams the ground, dealing 360(+80% Total Magic Power) (Magic Damage) to the enemy. On the final location, a (Goo) is left behind, and after 3s it explodes to deal 270(+60% Total Magic Power) (Magic Damage) to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1s.
